author: potuz
content: Hi <@!360491619402776577> Sorry to bug again, but I see these lines in the current branch by Peter <https://github.com/karalabe/go-ethereum/blob/beacon-sync-final/les/catalyst/api.go#L109-L114>, it seems you are returning SYNCING on all those blocks, but the sync error message is missing

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Peter only implemented it for eth not for les (so light client sync is probably broken atm)

author: potuz
content: Ah it's my damned YouCompleteMe that sent me there instead of the eth implementation

author: potuz
content: I don't know why I restarted the node which was previously synced and now I'm hitting `the method engine_executePayloadV1 does not exist/is not available`... it happened before when I forgot to init the chain  but this is not the case this time.

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Did you enable the `engine` namespace on startup?

author: potuz
content: yep, I'm running the same commands that synced me earlier, I'm actually syncing right now without issues, don't understand why I hit that error earlier this morning
